xbel.title: Code Your Own OS Links
xbel.desc: First I tried to make full index of related projects but there are sooooooo many :0( So here I'll put the links to OS related links collections (something like list of lists [LoL] ;0) ).

bookmark.title: The OS developers index
bookmark.desc: huge list of links to many OSes (Last updated May, 2000)

bookmark.title: FreeOS
bookmark.desc: The Resource Center for Free Operating Systems - links, articles, howtos. Very good place. I like it. Updated almost every day.

bookmark.title: Review of Operating Systems
bookmark.desc: Index favors original and research operating systems. In each category, systems are listed in alphabetical order (Last updated April, 2000).

bookmark.title: Current OS Projects and OS-related research
bookmark.desc: Pointers to all sorts of neat operating system projects scattered across the WWW.

bookmark.title: OS Kernels
bookmark.desc: SourceForge hosted projects. Usualy have CVS pool, help and developers forums.

bookmark.title: Visopsys OS Development
bookmark.desc: Collection of source code, information, and links related to general Operating Systems' Development on the Web.

bookmark.title: A Distributed Fish Enviroment
bookmark.desc: the FishNet was created as a way for SigOps members to demonstrate the operating systems they have individually written from scratch

bookmark.title: Aaron Gray's links
bookmark.desc: long list with useful links from news:alt.os.develop newsgroup postings

bookmark.title: MhewII's Web Space
bookmark.desc: info and links on using gcc/djgpp and nasm for hobby OSes.

bookmark.title: Operating Systems Resource Center
bookmark.desc: Very good links, separated by topics - boot process, protected mode, file formats,disk devices etc.

bookmark.title: Bryson's Graduate notes To Computer Science Index
Paul Hsieh's Tech Page
bookmark.desc: C & ASM tutors and sources, optimization,Watcom C/C++,Ninja Programmer, Other OSes etc.

folder.title: OS gurus
folder.desc: People who help as in newsgroups

bookmark.title: John Fine's home page
bookmark.desc: NASM information and links, boot code, v86 code, jloc linker/locator and partcopy - copy raw data (rawrite-like)

bookmark.title: Alexei A. Frounze home page
bookmark.desc: Tiny OS Kernel, Page Translation Tutorial (paging), V86 Mode Monitor Tutorial, BootProg (FAT/12 and FAT/16 boot). TASM,MASM

folder.title: Community
folder.desc: Places where to ask, talk etc.

bookmark.title: OS Development Message Board
bookmark.desc: if too slow try http://203.37.8.154/boardindex.phtml insteed
